Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Long
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Central, Irving Park, Laramie, and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Long.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Central, Irving Park, Laramie, and Montrose due to, street blockage near Montrose/Long.

Allow extra travel time.
